system.note:
Has an undermounted Grenade Launcher (Grenade Launcher (Mezoa) - RoF S/-/-, Range 80m, Clip 1, Rld Half). Usually Fires Photon Grenades.
 Up to +20 to Acquisition Tests if acquired through a friendly Tau Settlement.
